about.title: About me
about.primary: Since my start in this world of coding, which was a few years ago, it's going slow but steady. i haven't done much now as projects, but i'm still learning, and trying to get better.
about.secondary: Get in touche with me so i can help you reach what you like to see

projects.title: Lorem Movies
projects.description: A simple website to watch movies that you like, with cards showing the movies Poster, and when clicked on the Card it takes you to the Film description with a trailer to watch, and a button to watch the movie

projects.title: To Do App
projects.description: A to do app where you can add your notes to be done and delete when you finished doing them

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: You are very welcomed to send me an email asking for anything, I will be happy to help
